text: Since the previous elections in 2018, polling companies have published surveys tracking voting intention for the 2022 Brazilian general election. The results of these surveys are listed below in reverse chronological order and include parties whose candidates frequently poll above 3% of the vote as well as the incumbent President of Brazil Jair Bolsonaro. ==Presidential election== ===First round=== ====2020==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center;font-size:90%;line-height:14px;" ! rowspan="2"| Pollster/client(s) ! rowspan="2"| Date(s) conducted ! rowspan="2" data-sort-type="number"| Sample size ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Bolsonaro ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Lula* ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Haddad ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Dino ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Gomes ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Doria ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Amoêdo ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|MDB ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Silva ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|PODE ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Moro ! class="unsortable" style="width:50px;"|Huck ! rowspan="2" class="unsortable"| Others ! rowspan="2" class="unsortable"| Abst.
